forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 19C. NE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 67F. NE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy this evening with showers developing after midnight. Low 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
